description: Numbers n such that n^2 + 1 is not squarefree.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..7999
example: a(1) = 7 because 7^2 + 1 = 49 + 1 = 50 is divisible by 25, a square.
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,1e4,if(!issquarefree(n^2+1),print1(n", "))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 24 2011(MAGMA) [n: n in [1..6*10^2]| not IsSquarefree(n^2+1)]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Oct 15 2012
author: _Labos Elemer_
